verses.text: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who shall \w abide|strong="H1481"\w* in thy \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*? who shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*?\f + \fr 15.1 \ft abide: Heb. sojourn\f*

He that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w worketh|strong="H6466"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\add He that\add* \w backbiteth|strong="H7270"\w* not with his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, nor \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, nor taketh \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7138"\w*.\f + \fr 15.3 \ft takethâ€¦: or, receiveth, or, endureth\f*

In whose \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* a vile \w person|strong="H3988"\w* is \w contemned|strong="H0959"\w*; but he \w honoureth|strong="H3513"\w* them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \add He that\add* \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* to \add his own\add* \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w*, and \w changeth|strong="H4171"\w* not.

\add He that\add* putteth not \w out|strong="H5414"\w* his \w money|strong="H3701"\w* to \w usury|strong="H5392"\w*, nor \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w reward|strong="H7810"\w* against the \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*. He that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* these \add things\add* shall \w never|strong="H5769"\w* be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.
